alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dona Ana County through 215 PM MDT... At 145 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Las Cruces, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Las Cruces, NMSU Main Campus, Dona Ana, Mesilla, Fairacres, Picacho, San Pablo, Hill, Northeast Las Cruces and Mesilla Valley Bosque State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 131 and 144. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 3 and 13. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 152. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
